name: Unearmarked
description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes A,B or C.

name: Softly Earmarked
description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes D,E or F.

name: Earmarked
description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes G or H.

name: Tightly Earmarked
description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes I,J or K.
